content: U.S. trucking firm Schneider National Inc  on Tuesday posted a quarterly profit below expectations  hurt by higher costs for recruiting and retaining drivers and the impact of hurricanes in August and September.
name: Schneider National Inc
title: Trucking firm Schneider's profit hurt by driver costs  hurricanes
